<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.Args.emplace&#95;back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.Args.back().Key = Arg.Key;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.Args.back().Val = Arg.Val;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.Args.back().Loc = <a href="#ab3ba93e66512ebb2bba32798b1b7fac8">toRemarkLocation</a>(Arg.Loc);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmremarkstreamer/#afb8676fe8d06d8d0bd1c4d3db2107769"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmremarkstreamer/#afb8676fe8d06d8d0bd1c4d3db2107769">LLVMRemarkStreamer::emit</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticinfooptimizationbase">DiagnosticInfoOptimizationBase</a> &amp;Diag) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!RS.matchesFilter(Diag.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diagnosticinfooptimizationbase/#a51e48dc15ff1e5851f1ac88b2f959ff3">getPassName</a>()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First, convert the diagnostic to a remark.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/remark">remarks::Remark</a> R = toRemark(Diag);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Then, emit the remark through the serializer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  RS.getSerializer().emit(R);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> E = Context.getMainRemarkStreamer()-&gt;setFilter(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a29a674af5908403fd9aa59aa8194241f">RemarksPasses</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9999bd897fc8a1648bd69b36fee2d357">make&#95;error&lt;LLVMRemarkSetupPatternError&gt;</a>(std::move(E));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


</DoxygenPage>
